price: (4) And if they deny you, [O Muḥammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allāh are returned [all] matters.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
